page.title: 14Neighbours
page.content: My neighbours on the right side are very nice and gay. But my neighbours on the left side are as nasty as can be. When I play with the girl on the right we always walk together and chat. But the girl on the left side is very cruel and mean. When the people on the right side need to borrow things they ask nicely. But when the people on the left side need to borrow things they always ask miserably and shout about it. My neighbours on the right side will always play snooker with dad. But the neighbours on the left will play,but if they lose,will not talk. One neighbour is quiet and gay. The others are noisey and clumsy. I WONDER IF THEY LIKE ME?
